Section.Label: Chapter_DeepThought_automatic_generated_documentation_Section_DeepThought_automatic_generated_documentation_of_global_functions
Section.Heading: DeepThought automatic generated documentation of global functions

ManSection.Description: Computes the exponent vector y such that y = x^{-1} z for the group elements corresponding to the exponent vectors x and z. If DTobj[4] = true, then y describes a normal form.
